Package main

package main
  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    AssetSetter
    This class implements the objects: bronze coins, axe, blue shield, heart, mana crystal, the non-player character: old man, the monsters: green slimes and red mages and the interactive tile: dry trees and trunk on the map.
    CollisionChecker
    class to check collision between entities, objects and tiles
    Config
    allows saves and loads of volume, and full screen mode
    EventHandler
    handles events such as healing points, and damage traps
    EventRect
    instantiates class EventRect to handle events
    GamePanel
    This class implements the game screen.
    KeyHandler
    class to allow keyboard input and handle cursor/player movements
    Main
    This class implements the JFrame Window.
    Sound
    This implements the sounds of the added audio files.
    UI
    This class handles the User Interface.
    UtilityTool
    This class scales up the image taken as input
